Text: Thank you Nepotu!!  Sir, if you ever make your way to the Northwest (Seattle, Vancouver) I would like to show my appreciation by taking you out for lunch, or dinner (your choice)  Just say so and I'd be happy to send you my email address :-)
My dear friend, it's unlikely that I'm gonna rich Vancouver or Seattle. But thanks anyway! If you want to talk by email or face, I'd be happy to do. Cheers!

Hi Nepotu,
That is too bad :-(  Whenever you have the time please write so that I can find another way to show my appreciation for all the work you do for all the sports fans out here.  My email is: jayspot04@yahoo.com  again, my deepest gratitude
